snippet.title: Gothic 2 Gold Edition - Intro Trailer
snippet.description:
✅ Link to the game 👉  https://bit.ly/3nlqFK4

Enter a medieval world filled with armies of orcs, brutal beasts, and other evils hidden everywhere. Solve the secrets and riddles of an ancient culture. Find yourself buried in the dark caverns of the underground temple. After being buried in the dark caverns of an underground temple, find yourself rescued by Xardas, the demon charmer, and prepare to embark on a gripping adventure…

Follow us on:
Web: 👉  https://bit.ly/3rpVmMh
Twitch: 👉  https://bit.ly/3vVI6CJ
Twitter: 👉  https://bit.ly/3fdOUFK
Facebook: 👉  https://bit.ly/2NWKVCw
